description.ko: 끝없는 네온 불빛 아래 디지털 꿈과 현실이 교차하는 거대 첨단 도시의 숨막히는 전경입니다.
description.en: A breathtaking view of a sprawling high-tech city where digital dreams and reality collide under the glow of endless neon lights.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a futuristic cyberpunk city at night, rain-slicked streets reflecting vibrant neon signs in magenta and teal, massive holographic displays of virtual avatars, dense urban architecture with flying vehicles weaving through skyscrapers, hyper-realistic, 8k, synthwave atmosphere, moody lighting.
